programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Killer On The Strip/The Doll Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E11, In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Pilot

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E07, Daniel's Unas friend, Chaka (Dion Johnstone), is captured by a pre-industrial civilization that uses Unas as slaves. While attempting to free Chaka from this cruel regime, Daniel risks the safety of SG-1, and possibly the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Tomb
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E08, On a rescue mission to recover Russian soldiers believed missing in action on a previously undisclosed trip, the SG-1 team gets trapped in a Goa'uld tomb with a number of decomposed bodiesand a deadly alien monster with an appetite for human flesh!

programme.title: Between Two Fires
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E09, The SG-1 team returns to Tollana for the funeral of Chancellor Omoc, only to discover the rulers have reversed their policy on technology sharing and will now trade advanced weaponry with Earth. But is there a secret agenda behind the gesture?

Stargate SG-1, S05E10, SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E11, When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E12, A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Rising (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E01, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy , where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy that feeds on human fear. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Rising (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E02, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E03, McKay (David Hewlett) volunteers to be the first to try Beckett's (Paul McGillion) newest ATA gene therapy. But things go wrong when the device cannot be removed, and is stopping Dr. McKay from being able to eat or drink and endangering his life.

programme.title: Thirty Eight Minutes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E04, The Stargate team must rush to save Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) after he becomes lodged in the Stargate, with only 38 minutes until the gate automatically disengages, and Sheppard is expelled into space, where he will surely asphyxiate.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E05, After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Childhood's End
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E06, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Seizure

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destinys crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.
